page.title: 09Batley Market Square cont.
page.content: The market is in the centre of the square and is set up on a Friday and a Saturday morning.It has many stalls like fruit and vegetables,toys,clothes and a tripe stall which has been there for many years.The stalls still stand on cobble stones. Right at the back of the market square is a war memorial and reads,"In greatful memory of the men of this town who fell in the Great War 1914-18 and in the World War 1939-1945." Hundreds of names are engraved on the base of the memorial and on the fence which surrounds it.There is also a seat near the memorial which celebrates Batley's centenary 1863-1963.There is a palque attached to it which shows this .
